wikipedia_page.main: Arthur Richard Black (18 February 1907 – unknown) was a Scottish footballer. His regular position was as a forward. He was born in Airdrie.  He played for Stenhousemuir, Blantyre Victoria, Greenock Morton, St Mirren, and Manchester United.

response: Richard Black or Dick Black may also refer to:
* Dick Black (politician) (Richard Hayden Black, born 1944), American politician
* Dick Black (footballer) (Arthur Richard Black, 1907–unknown), Scottish footballer
